column4: I'm new to linux. And everything here is new. I recall only some from my Slackware 4.0 period (wich lasted a few months). But where would you guys start to get a good understanding of Linux Kernel and all that comes with, let us say ubuntu :-D
anything in particular you want to do?
Hehe =) Been there, but thanks. Start there and work my way to a Linux genius!
